Text: what? why are people always writing in their stupid languages? please... write in english for the love of god!

XoSkellet, your comment about "their stupid languages" is unbelievably stupid and shows how limited a person you are. 
Has it ever occured to you that on our 6-billion-people planet English isnt everyone's mother tongue ? 
This is a Japanese movie with Polish subtitles. The desc is in Polish for Polish people. If you dont understand something you're not the target audience.
You might also have noticed that this is a swedish site... not an english one.
If anyone from Poland are kind enough, you could translate from Polish to English. That would be totaly awesome :D

This is a collection of CG films from Final Fantasy VII:Dirge of Cerberus, the newest game from Square-Enix. Plot takes place after 3 years from the                      events of oryginal Final Fantasy VII. Organization called World Restoration Organization (W.R.O.) wich members are Cloud, Tifa, Barret and others helps to recover the planet from the great scarf given to it by the Meteor. Vincent gets invited by Reeve, the scientist and the director of W.R.O. ona the Rebirth Festival of Calm. He arrives when Deep Ground Soldiers attack the city. With  the beginning of the attack enigmatic figure of Vincent and history of his tragic love comes to light...
